problems.title: Power of Four (Bit Manipulation)
problems.description:
Problem Statement

Given an integer n, return true if it is a power of four. Otherwise, return false.
An integer n is a power of four, if there exists an integer x such that n == 4^x.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
16

Sample Output
True

Explanation: 4^2 = 16

Sample Input
5

Sample Output
False

Explanation: 5 is not a power of four.

Sample Input
1

Sample Output
True

Explanation: 4^0 = 1
hintsList: A power of four has exactly one bit set, and that bit is at an even position.
